articles.title: Building an America First State Department - U.S. Department of State (.gov)
articles.description: We are facing tremendous challenges across the globe. To deliver on President Trump’s America First foreign policy, we must make the State Department Great Again. In its current form, the Department is bloated, bureaucratic, and unable to perform its essentia…
articles.content:
We are facing tremendous challenges across the globe. To deliver on President Trumps America First foreign policy, we must make the State Department Great Again.
